Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a good 600 dollar price range television. Now I'm not no cinema guru that has to have the best of the best, I just wanted a bare bones TV without all the smart options and what not. This one seems to fit the bill, good picture, good color, everything is what to be expected for this price range of television. I am happy with this product.

ProductInfo.Features:
1920 X 1080 (1080p) Full HD Pixel Resolution
ClearScan 120Hz
Input: 3 HDMI, 1 Component, 1 RCA, 1 USB
Dimensions W/Stand (WHD): 44.8" X 29.3" X 9.4"
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba 50L2300U 50" 1080p LED-LCD TV - 16:9 - HDTV 1080p 1920 x 1080 - Audyssey ABX, Audyssey EQ - 3 x HDMI - USB - Ethernet - Media Player
